name: Map Styling & Visual Polish
goal: Adapt the Leaflet map and visual effects for both themes

prds.description: Update Leaflet tile layer brightness/contrast for each theme
steps: Start game in dark theme
Verify map tiles are slightly darkened (current behavior)
Switch to light theme
Verify map tiles are brighter/clearer
Verify county borders are visible in both themes

prds.description: Update glow effects and shadows for light theme
steps: Switch to light theme
Verify neon glow effects are toned down but still visible
Verify text shadows provide sufficient contrast
Verify button hover effects work in light theme
Compare visual hierarchy with dark theme - should be equivalent

prds.description: Fix glassmorphism overlays for light theme
steps: Switch to light theme
Verify glass panels (modals, floating header) are visible
Verify backdrop blur effect works
Verify glass borders are visible but not overpowering
Verify text on glass panels is readable

prds.description: Test all game states (playing, won, lost) in both themes
steps: Start new game in dark theme
Make guesses - verify colors update correctly
Win a game - verify confetti and modal styling in dark theme
Switch to light theme
Start new game, make guesses - verify colors update correctly
Lose a game (use 6 wrong guesses) - verify end modal in light theme

prds.description: Verify proximity feedback colors work in both themes
steps: Make guesses in dark theme
Verify color progression: blue → yellow → orange → red → green
Verify all colors are clearly distinguishable
Switch to light theme
Make guesses in light theme
Verify same color progression is visible and distinguishable
Verify sufficient contrast against light background
